sentences.en: A : Would you please pass me your passbook with the deposIt'slip?
sentences.cn: A: 请把您的存折和存款凭条递给我好 吗 ?

sentences.en: And you just need to bring your passbook and fill in a withdrawal slip.
sentences.cn: 而且也只需把存折带来并填写一张取款凭条.

sentences.en: B : Please give me your money with the passbook.
sentences.cn: 请把您的钱和存折递过来.

sentences.en: Bank Clerk: Here are your card and passbook. Please bring either one when you deposit or draw money. Keep them well and inform us if you lose them.
sentences.cn: 银行职员：这是您的卡和存折，存取款时请带来。保管好存折，如有遗失请及时告诉我们。

sentences.en: Can I see your passbook and the withdrawal slip , please?
sentences.cn: 可不可以让我看你的存折及提款单 呢 ?

sentences.en: Give me your money and passbook.
Good. Everything is finished. Here is your passbook and passport.
sentences.cn: 好, 一切都办好了,给您存折和护照.

sentences.en: Here's your passbook and your passcard.
sentences.cn: 这是您的存折和银行卡.

sentences.en: Of course. Have you brought your passbook?
sentences.cn: 当然可以, 你带存折来了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Protect your passbook well and inform us immediately if you lose it.
sentences.cn: 保管好存折,假如丢失了请立即通知我们.

sentences.en: The Great Wall Debit Card has a matched passbook.
sentences.cn: 长城借记卡有一本对应的存折.

sentences.en: The passbook is for your own records.
sentences.cn: 存折是给您自己的记录.

sentences.en: What if he can't find the passbook?
sentences.cn: 要是他不能找到存折，该怎么办？

sentences.en: Would you like me to record this transaction on your passbook?
sentences.cn: 我给你的存折上做个记录好吗 ?

sentences.en: Would you please give your withdrawal slip and your passbook?
sentences.cn: 请把您的取款条和存折给我好 吗 ?
请吧. 这是我的存折.

sentences.en: Yes. ( After a ) This is your money , your passbook and the check slip.
sentences.cn: 好.请把“活期一本通”存折递给我.给您.

sentences.en: You fill out this application form and we'll issue you a passbook.
sentences.cn: 你填好这张申请表,我们会给你一本存折.

trans.tran_cn: <英>（建房互助会的）存取款记录簿，<南非>（种族隔离时期所有黑人随身携带的）有色人种身份证
trans.tran_en: a book in which a record is kept of the money you put into and take out of a bank account
